RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRUSIN LIKE A CAT broke in good order, dueled up front in the two path, continued to alternate for the advantage through the turn, disposed of the other speed while drifting in slightly in mid stretch then had enough left to hold the runner up safe late. MISS LEONA back off the early pace, four wide into the lane, set down, rallied down the middle of the strip to be getting to the winner, too late for that one, edged clear 2nd. TRUE PRINCESS dueled up front closest to the inside, continued to vied into the lane, was beginning to yield when put in a bit tight by the winner a furlong out, continued to weaken to lose the place. MARIAH chased the dueling leader for three furlongs and had little for the drive. KATIES FACTOR last away, trailed throughout in failing to threaten. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF TRUE PRINCESS AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN MIDSTRETCH WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: True Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, weakening when bit tight 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Katies Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Crusin Like a Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, edged clear, slight drift, enough left late

ENTRY.NAME: Mariah
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel off rail, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Leona
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the early pace, rallied midtrack, steady gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNOCKALITTLELOUDER broke best of all, dueled up the backstretch off the inside, disposed of the other speed turning for home, drew out through upper stretch, token encouragement late. UNFATHOMED closest to the dueling leader for a half, proved no match for the winner the final furlong, clearly second best. QUANA DUDE went one paced throughout while well out in the strip to finish up best of the rest. WHY JOEY WHY dueled up front closest to the inside for four furlongs, first to blink. FOOLISH DREAMS well back off the early pace, failed to muster a response in the drive. GALLANT STAR fell back to trail, never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Why Joey Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, first to blink

ENTRY.NAME: Knockalittlelouder
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off rail, shook clear, ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Earl Hernandez, Keith Hernandez & John Duvieilh

ENTRY.NAME: Unfathomed
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to duel, no match, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Quana Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to respond in the drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 94. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 22, 202 3 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COROT asked for some run out of the gate to maintain inside position, dueled up the backstretch and through the turn closest to the inside, continued to alternate for the advantage into the lane, long drive, gained a larger lead late, just lasted to hold the runner up safe with his rider standing up in the saddle two jumps from the wire. IN THE ARCH void of early foot after being last away, continued to lag through the turn while in the three path, set down for the drive, shifted out a bit approaching the furlong marker, late burst to narrowly miss nailing the winner at the wire. AHIMAAZ broke well, set or forced the pace in the two path, continued to battle outside the winner through the stretch, proved stubborn to the end while between the top two at the wire. BEHIND THE CURTAIN in the second flight behind the dueling leaders, came up empty when asked for the drive. FLUFFPOINT in the second flight toward the inside, had little left late. COMPLEX SYSTEM was never a serious threat. MORE LIKE IT fell back to trail after the start, never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Corot
ENTRY.COMMENT: asked early, dueled rail, long drive, just lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Fluffpoint
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group early, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: Ahimaaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, set or forced pace inside, stubbornly

ENTRY.NAME: Complex System
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a serious threat

ENTRY.NAME: Behind the Curtain
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance in 2nd flight, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: In the Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, 3w turn, shifted out, late burst to miss

ENTRY.NAME: More Like It
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, never threatened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARD FOUR with the early pace between foes, shuffled back from some traffic into the turn, moved out, five wide move to become prominent again entering the stretch, put a head in front nearing midstretch, surged clear, held the runner up comfortably safe late under steady handling. VIKING LEGACY steadied at the break to be away slowly, continued well back into and through the turn, came widest for the drive and launched a rally down the middle of the strip to be closing the gap on the winner late. PEANUT N IKE lacked early foot outside into the turn, three wide exiting, shifted out past the furlong marker, staged a mild rally to annex the show. DIAL UNCLE JOEY broke on top, showed the way up the backstretch, continued to hold the advantage toward the inside into the stretch, began to weaken when headed by the winner soon after. GOLDENLUTE pressed the issue for three furlongs while between horses and began to weaken. F T W SLAM forwardly placed early while saving ground, backed up while remaining inside. SKIPPA within striking distance while racing outside, gave way in upper stretch while in some traffic.

ENTRY.NAME: F T W Slam
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled 7/16, moved out, 5w into late, bid, clear, held

ENTRY.NAME: Peanut N Ike
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 3w late turn, steered out, mild rally shgow

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Uncle Joey
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Viking Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied, off slow, well back, late run midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Goldenlute
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the issue for three furlongs, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Skippa
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, gave way stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TENSAS ALL OURS broke out and in mid pack, moved up to stalk three wide, continued to patiently track the leaders from the outside up the backstretch, took over late in the final turn, strongly clear, ridden out. IDE LIKE HAWAII four wide first turn when off the pace, continued outside up the backstretch, three wide second turn, rallied to be closest to the winner a sixteenth out, no match for that one while holding sway late for the place. K V TARGET void of speed outside after being last away, four wide turning for home, set down, finished willingly to be getting to the runner up late. CATINANDSCATIN set or forced the pace after breaking in good order, held a narrow advantage over the winner midway on the final turn, headed by that one entering the stretch, drifted out when offering little resistance and weakened. SABER STORM in some traffic while three wide in the first turn, continued one paced and finished up evenly in lacking a closing response. SABERMAN within striking distance early, fell back after a half, picked off a couple of tiring rivals through the lane while not posing a serious threat. DARK MATTER broke back and remained there in failing to menace. BERNIE SPECIAL set or forced the pace for almost six furlongs closest to the inside and faltered. ADMIRAL AFLEET in mid pack most of the way, gave way through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Saberman
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance,fell back after half, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Admiral Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, gave way through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Bernie Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace for almost six furlongs and faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Catinandscatin
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace, headed late 2nd, drifted upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Saber Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: traffic 1st turn 3w, one paced in lacking late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas All Ours
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,moved up to stalk 3w,took over,strongly, clr,riddn out

ENTRY.NAME: Ide Like Hawaii
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, mid pack and outside, 3w 2nd, rallied 2nd,no match

ENTRY.NAME: K V Target
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, four wide into lane, getting to runner up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONEGAL ARROW in the second group up the backstretch outside, lodged a four wide move when moving to challenge exiting the turn, drew clear late under steady urging. TIZ DONEGAL vied up front in the run up the backstretch, garnered a larger advantage through the turn, raced on equal terms with the winner past the furlong marker then proved no match late, remained comfortably clear for the second spot. GREAT RUNNER within striking distance, raced in some traffic second turn, went one paced the final furlong to prove no match for the top pair. MONOLITH void of speed, was roused three wide turning for home, displayed a mild amount of late interest to improve position. JOHNNNY'S GAME with the first flight three wide early, continued to vie into the turn, weakened through the stretch. KISSOFTHENILE vied front while between horses for a half, began to weaken thereafter. GROSSE TETE IAN remained back in failing to threaten. MOTANAAFER remained back to be always outrun. EMPYREAL SHADOW fell back after the start, continued to race sluggishly and also was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Donegal
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early inside, larger lead turn, dueled midstretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Kissofthenile
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between foes, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Monolith
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, roused 3w, displayed mild interest

ENTRY.NAME: Great Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, traffic turn toward rail, no match top2

ENTRY.NAME: Johnnny's Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace three wide, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Motanaafer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back,always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Donegal Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group outside, 4w advance into lane, took over, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Empyreal Shadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back,sluggish, not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Grosse Tete Ian
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threaten

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (ClaimingR aces For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IZZY'S BABY BOY broke well from along the inside, continued to show the way up the backstretch and second turn, found more through the lane when confronted, enough left to last at the wire. NATE'S ATTACK between horses up the backstretch when off the pace, dropped inside second turn, cut the corner to reach contention into the stretch, closer still inside nearing midstretch, stalled, switched out late, willingly, missed at the wire. ONE TIME GEM in mid pack early while outside, moved closer late in the final turn to a challenging position, failed to sustain that advance on the winner through the lane. RUN ROCKET fell back to trail, continued to lack speed, improved position a bit after being roused into the lane with some modest late interest. STANDING MAN also lacked any early speed, failed to muster a rally when called on in the drive. SEEHOSS within striking distance early, was finished after a half. AFLEET ASCENT chased the winner for five furlongs and began to give way.

ENTRY.NAME: Izzy's Baby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well inside, cleared, found more stretch, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Seehoss
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Run Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, improved, modest late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Standing Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Ascent
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for five furlongs, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Nate's Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: btwn foes off pace, dropped inside, switched out late,missed

ENTRY.NAME: One Time Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack outside, closer outside into lane, flattened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or OverS ince June 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 22, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOR HARPER allowed the pace to go early while four wide through the first turn, continued outside, ranged up outside and collared the leader turning for home,quickly clear, ridden out. CZAR'S BALLERINA broke in, bothered foe, raced behind the pace inside, continued to save ground second turn, steered out for the drive, clear for the place without posing a threat to the winner. STARSHIP JAMBALAYA broke on top, soon got clear, set the pace while rating the middle half, offered brief resistance to the winner turning for home then proved no match for that one or the runner up, comfortably saved the show. CRYSTAL D'ORO raced off the pace and the inside, failed to respond when called on for the drive. SCARLET STORM chased the leader for five furlongs, caved in far turn. START WELL bothered at the start, trailed throughout to be always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Start Well
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Czar's Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, bothered foe, main group inside, steered out, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Jambalaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, clear, rated, comfortably saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlet Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for five furlongs, caved far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace and the inside, failed to respond drive

ENTRY.NAME: For Harper
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 4w 1st turn, outside advance,quickly clr,ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Clear Creek Stud LLC & Theodore Brandon

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DR STRICKLANDS ACE back off the early pace outside, advanced on the leader four wide through the turn, carried out by that one into the stretch, gained the advantage when straightened for home, drew well clear under a steady hand ride in a promising debut. SECRET GUITAR settled in mid pack, steadied in traffic into the turn, roused midway on the bend after recovering, closed with good resolve to be up in time for the place, not a threat to the winner. FAST OUT off a step slow, lacked speed four a half, staged a late rally to be up for the show. STRUMMIN MARY back off the pace, shuffled back rail with a half to run, into the stretch off the inside, mild late interest to improve slightly. KRAZY KATIE quickly sprinted clear after the start, set the pace, got out carrying the winner out late in the turn then faltered when headed by that one in upper stretch. SPARKLE CITY chased the early leader then began a steady fade before three furlongs. HAIRTRIGGER HEART within striking distance on the outside of the second flight, faded. DEE'S LIL FOOL was finished after three furlongs. WINNING NUMBERS FOR FIRST LEG OF THE PICK FIVE SHOULD INCLUDE 11,12,13 AND 14. MUTUEL FIELD INSIGNIFICANT IN LENGTH TO INCLUDE ON PAYOFF LINE.

ENTRY.NAME: Krazy Katie
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly sprinted clear, pace, got out late turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Strummin Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, shuffled rail 1/2, mild late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, lacked speed, late rally show

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle City
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, steadied, traffic 7/16, roused turn,up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Lil Fool
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after three furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Stricklands Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w advance, carried out 1/4, took over, well clear, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Hairtrigger Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, faded
